Articles.Content: Jupiter spreads around the fractured asteroid pieces.
I am capable of changing what happened in the past. My hill.
You haven't born. No you hill.
I launch an ICBM into [@kerbiloid](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/129408-kerbiloid/)'s hill. my hill.
the kerbiloid had no hill, so you have accidentally killed your own hill
I have a nice pretty invincible hill on Laythe. My hill.
I turn [@Fraston](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/188565-fraston/)'s ICBMs into orbital launch vehicles, rendering him defenceless. My hill.
i take the hill. my hill.
hill takes you. hill's you.

> 
> 
> 8 hours ago, kerbiloid said:
> 
> 
> hill takes you. hill's you.
> 

LOL as they say. I make the hill invincible to everything. My hill.

I add more dirt to your hill. It is now a mountain. Because you said your former hill was invincible, it shall forever remain a mountain. I use some more dirt to make my own hill.

My hill.
I make a big fortress atop the mountain and rain bullets and lasers on your pitiful hill. I make it invincible after I claim it. My invincible hill and mountain.
I blow up your pathetic dirt hill before making my own with concrete. My hill.

I note that concrete is generally not considered a legitimate material for a hill.

No hill.

> 
> 
> 3 hours ago, greenTurtle1134 said:
> 
> 
> I note that concrete is generally not considered a legitimate material for a hill.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> No hill.
> 

I take a shovel, and dig a hole, and use the leftover material to build my own hill. My <font face="Lucida Sans Unicode, Lucida Grande, sans-serif">slightly gluey hill and crater.</font>

I shoot you with a nail gun. 

my hill.

Spoiler

KSP Forums/Community/ blah blah/ King Of The Hill

Users dead in fictional universe = ~~HansonKerman~~

Hill ownership = ~~Fraston~~ HansonKerman

// And, as a bonus:

Hillglueyness = 0

My hill.
Rollback transaction.
I can CHANGE TIME my hill.

What?

Hill claimed due to my ownership of the hill.
Your owner gets his ship far from the hill.
I change time so that [@HansonKerman](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185809-hansonkerman/) gets blown up. My hill.
I challenge [@The Minmus Derp](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/187595-the-minmus-derp/) to a sword duel. I win, obviously. my hill.
Did he even came?
No. I delete your sword from the spacetime continuum. I win. My hill.
